articles.title: Best Buy's Massive 3-Day Sale Has Deals on Top Tech, Major Appliances and More - CNET
articles.description: This weekend, you can save big on everything from TVs and headphones to refrigerators and dishwashers over at Best Buy.
articles.content: Best Buy has officially launched its new three-day sale, with tempting deals on tech gadgets, home goods and more. If you're in the market for a device upgrade or a fresh set of appliances, now's a f… [+1161 chars]

articles.author: Rakesh Patil
articles.title: Broader indices outperform; More than 100 smallcaps give double digit return - Moneycontrol
articles.description: For the short term, 22,620-22,630 will act as resistance for the Nifty. If the index sustains above 22,630, Nifty could attempt to break its all-time high of 22,776, says Hrishikesh Yedve, AVP Technical and Derivatives Research at Asit C. Mehta.
articles.content:
Broader indices continued to outperform the main indices in the week ended April 26 as mid and smallcap indices jumped 4 percent each with more than 100 small-cap stocks giving double-digit return.
